00012 typedef std::map <std::string, Resource*> Resource_map;

00014 /* Class: Resource_manager
00015  * Managing resources.
00016  * */
00017 class Resource_manager
00018 {
00019     public:
00020         /* Constructor: Resource_manager
00021          * */
00022         Resource_manager();
00023         /* Destructor: Resource_manager
00024          * */
00025         ~Resource_manager();
00026 
00027                 /* Function: Load
00028                  * Loads a resource, or returns it if it has already been loaded.
00029                  * 
00030                  * Parameters:
00031                  * filename - File to load
00032                  * 
00033                  * Returns:
00034                  * Pointer to loaded resource.
00035                  * */
00036         template <typename T> T *Load(std::string filename)
00037                 {
00038             std::string resname = filename + "*" + typeid(T).name();
00039             Resource_map::iterator i = resources.find(resname);
00040 
00041             if(i != resources.end()) {
00042                 return (T*)(i->second);
00043             }
00044 
00045             T *resource = new T;
00046             if(!resource->Load(filename)) {
00047                                 std::cout << "Resource failed to load: " << filename << std::endl;
00048                 delete resource;
00049                 return 0;
00050             }
00051 
00052             resources[resname] = resource;
00053 
00054             return resource;
00055         }
00056 
00057     private:
00058         Resource_map resources;
00059 };
